scenes.background: (Monica) glances at you with a concerned look. (Bob) is typing something furiously on his laptop.
scenes.description: 'I just don't see how we can get this done without more help. What are we supposed to do now?'

options.text: Maybe we should prioritize tasks and focus on the most critical ones first.
options.analysis: You suggested a logical approach, showing good perception and social skills, though your motivation and self-regulation were moderate.

options.text: I understand your frustration, but complaining won't solve the problem. Let's find a solution.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the frustration but emphasized action over complaining, showing strong self-regulation but lower empathy and motivation.

options.text: If everyone did their part, we wouldn't be in this mess. Maybe we need to address that.
options.analysis: Your response was somewhat passive-aggressive, indicating lower empathy and self-regulation, and it might strain relationships with colleagues.
